title: China teams up with Taliban in unlikely partnership
description: CNN's David Culver takes a closer look at the budding relationship between the Taliban and China.

title: Newly uncovered video delays Capitol rioter's sentencing
description: Robert Reeder's sentencing was pushed back after online volunteer sleuths known as the Sedition Hunters unearthed video apparently showing the charged insurrectionist beating up a police officer. CNN's Jessica Schneider reports it forced prosecutors to rethink their charges merely hours before the judge's decision.

title: Afghan youth soccer player died falling from US military plane
description: A teenager on Afghanistan's youth national football team was one of the victims that fell from the US military C-17 aircraft on Monday, Afghanistan's General Directorate of Physical Education and Sports confirmed in a statement on social media Thursday morning.

title: 'Top Gun' actor lost his voice to cancer. He used AI to bring it back.
description: Actor Val Kilmer lost his voice in 2015 due to complications to throat cancer. For his new documentary "Val," Kilmer sought out a company to create a synthetic version of his voice using audio deepfake technology to be used as a voiceover.

title: Rain falls on normally snowy Greenland summit for first time on record
description: For the first time on record, precipitation on Saturday at the summit of Greenland — roughly two miles above sea level — fell as rain and not snow.

title: Watch these humanoid robots fall flat on their faces
description: Boston Dynamics has had success in the past in showcasing its impressive lineup of robot capabilities in mobility. But before success comes failure.

title: Joe Biden is facing a crisis of competence
description: President Joe Biden tried to build a narrative around competency based on his history in public service during the 2020 campaign, but his first term has been complicated by several issues that call that campaign promise into question. In the latest episode of The Point, CNN's Chris Cillizza examines how Biden's handling of Covid-19, Afghanistan and other policies have weakened the President's approval.

title: Opinion: Before this week, when did you think of Afghanistan?
description: In the end it was a sin of inattention.

title: US veterans speak out on Afghanistan
description: CNN's Tom Foreman speaks with US veterans who are struggling to come to terms with the Taliban's takeover of Afghanistan.

title: Her teen felt isolated in the pandemic. She lost him because of it
description: Heathyr Sidle's son died by suicide shortly after starting high school remotely. She and two teenagers share stories of coping with the mental health crisis during the Covid-19 pandemic.

title: It survived disease and war. Now the challenge is tourists
description: Lord Byron called it the Pearl of the Adriatic when he passed through on his Grand Tour in the early 19th century.

title: Meet Grace, the 'almost real' robot  nurse
description: In 2016, Hanson Robotics took the world by storm with Sophia, who was famously given Saudi Arabian citizenship. Now, the Hong Kong-based robotics firm has unveiled its latest invention: Grace, a humanoid robot it hopes will revolutionize healthcare.

title: See what rural Haiti looks like now in new report from the ground
description: Drone footage above the town center of Corail shows the extent of the damage in this fishing village near the epicenter: the church caved in and more than 3,300 homes were destroyed. CNN's Matt Rivers reports from the town and shows us how locals are taking matters into their own hands to start the recovery because no central government support has arrived yet.

title: Biden's presidency is under scrutiny as never before over Afghan chaos
I fled Kabul in 1992, and I'm having disturbing flashbacks
description: This week has been highly distressing for millions of Afghans like me. We witnessed, in real-time, the Taliban take over Afghanistan two decades after the US began its so-called "war on terror." But this catastrophe could have been avoided -- and, more to the point, it should have been.

title: Rates of Covid-19 hospitalizations for children and adults under 50 reach their highest levels yet, CDC data shows
description: The pace of Covid-19 hospitalizations is surging across the US, with the rates for children and adults under 50 hitting their highest levels yet, according to data from the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention.

title: Fred continues to threaten heavy rains and tornadoes after flooding in North Carolina that left 35 people unaccounted for
description: Fred has been downgraded to a post-tropical cyclone, but the storm still poses a danger for parts of the US.

title: Biden is battling increasing criticism and struggling to explain why he failed to predict the swift collapse of the Afghan state
The latest on Afghanistan as Taliban take charge
An intensifying Hurricane Grace is expected to strike Mexico's Yucatan Peninsula Thursday
description: After striking Haiti and impacting other Caribbean islands this week as a tropical storm, an intensifying Hurricane Grace is expected to make landfall on the Yucatan Peninsula in Mexico Thursday morning.

title: Singapore sentences Briton to 6 weeks in prison for not wearing face mask
description: A Singapore court sentenced a British man to six weeks in prison on Wednesday, local media reported, after he repeatedly breached coronavirus protocols by refusing to wear a face mask in public.

title: Huawei CFO Meng Wanzhou's extradition hearings have finally wrapped up. The case isn't over yet
description: Extradition hearings for Huawei CFO Meng Wanzhou have concluded more than two years after she was arrested in Vancouver, Canada.

title: Death toll since Myanmar coup tops 1,000, says activist group
description: The death toll as a result of Myanmar's coup in February this year has topped 1,000, according to an official of the Assistance Association of Political Prisoners (AAPP) activist group, which has been recording killings by security forces.

title: Taliban fighters accost CNN reporter and crew
Hospitals overrun with survivors as death toll from Haiti quake expected to keep rising
description: Hospitals in Haiti are completely overwhelmed by survivors of Saturday's 7.2-magnitude earthquake and urgently need help to treat them, medical staff say.

title: Chaos fuels allies' fears of more 'America First' under Biden
Golden retriever melts hearts as social media star
description: Even Celine Dion is a fan of this golden retriever turned social media sensation. CNN's Jeanne Moos reports.

title: This 'imperfect' virtual influencer is challenging beauty standards in China
description: "Your skin's a bit dry," one user commented on a video posted by Angie, a popular influencer who first appeared on Chinese social media last fall. "You should apply a face mask."

title: How Russia is reacting to US withdrawal from Afghanistan
description: CNN's Fred Pleitgen reports on the international reaction to the Taliban's takeover of Afghanistan following the withdrawal of US troops.

title: North Carolina poised to raise minimum marriage age from 14 to 16
description: North Carolina is one step away from raising the minimum age at which children in the state can wed from 14 to 16 after lawmakers there approved a measure that would change several key rules around child marriages in the state.

title: New images show Russia may be about to test nuclear-powered 'Skyfall' missile
description: New satellite images obtained by CNN show Russia may be preparing another test of its nuclear-powered cruise missile, known as "Skyfall"-- a controversial weapon that is designed to defeat US defense systems.

title: Facebook takes action against 'disinformation dozen' after White House pressure
description: Facebook on Wednesday announced that it had taken action against the so-called "disinformation dozen," one month after the White House singled out the twelve people and argued that they were responsible for a majority of coronavirus misinformation.
